_sText:
Description
===========

This is my fourth map I created for Counter-Strike: Source. It is a recreation of the Half-Life map "hlk_killbox" by [HLK] Slayer. Since I think
this map has great potential I want to distribute it to further games like Counter-Strike: Source and soon also Half-Life 2: Deathmatch. Although
I wanted to keep the atmosphere as much as possible I took the chance to give it a fresh new look as you can see - shiny floors and walls, great
lighting and a clean environment give it a new fancy appeal.

Gameplay
========

Since it is mostly an optical recreation the structure of the map has not changed, leaving wide open areas to the player. I recommend to ban
sniper rifles if you are hosting a server. And for the height... Do not be afraid to simply jump! Try it out!

Installation
============

Extract the bsp-file from the zip folder into the directory

**C:\programs\Steam\SteamApps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps**

(default Steam directory)

Feedback
========

**Any feedback will be appreciated!** Tell me which visual changes I should do next time I recreate another map. What do you like
especially about the fancy look of the map? Does it fit well? What should I have done better in your opinion? I would love to know!
